name: bottimmo-widget
description: A Gutenberg block to help implementing BOTTIMMO Widgets.
author: BOTTIMMO IT <it@bottimmo.com>

scripts.plugin-zip:leadturbo: npm run build:leadturbo && wp-scripts plugin-zip && cp bottimmo-widget.zip lead-turbo-widget.zip
scripts.plugin-zip:demo: npm run build:demo && wp-scripts plugin-zip && cp bottimmo-widget.zip bottimmo-demo-widget.zip
